entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING, Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:56 a.m. EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to a few flurries near noon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning then west 20 late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:25 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
